sentences.sContent: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.sCn: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.sContent: There was a lot of tension on the wire before it snapped.
sentences.sCn: 金属丝承受着很大的拉力，最后绷断了。

trans.tranOther: a nervous worried feeling that makes it impossible for you to relax
